item.description:
Summer Fun..Dinner/Tiki Bar - Salvation Cafe - Great Food/Great Drinks

What better way to enjoy a summer night than having food & drinks with new/old friends.

We have had great times at Salvation this will be one of those nights : )...

We'll meet at the outdoor bar (all the way in the back) or will already be at our table.

A cool Tiki Bar environment!

I made a reservation under my name - Lonnie.

With a table reservation - arrive hungry and thirsty as close to 7:00 as possible. This place is hopping on Saturday nights..not easy to get those reservations - did I say - Great Food!!

Please keep your RSVP current - deadline August 13, 2010 - 4PM. due to reservation purposes.
Feel free to text or call me if you are running late or planning to join us later.

We can make our way down to other bars if our group feels like a Pub crawl...txt after 8:30 or 9:00 if you can't make dinner but want to join in drinks after dinner.

*If there are any changes to event by Saturday I will email/post by noon, so watch the site.
If you want to attend and we are at maximum email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at outdoor bar area - all the way in the back or at our table - Reservation under Lonnie -. 401-829-8516.
item.name: Summer Fun..Dinner/Tiki Bar - Salvation Cafe - Great Food/Great Drinks
